summary: Client Sarah requested to start a vision meeting. The PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide input.

actions.task: Start the vision meeting and prepare a draft agenda
Define or confirm the project name

backlog_deltas.title: Add backlog item to schedule and prepare the vision meeting / project kickoff

risks.risk: Key roles (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input, risking missing perspectives for the vision meeting.
